short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manages and closes inactive Google Meet landing tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of cluttered browser tabs after your Google Meet sessions? Install Google Meet Tab Terminator! This smart extension automatically closes lingering inactive Google Meet tabs once your meeting ends, keeping your browser tidy and your workflow smooth.

Features: 
• Timely cleanup: Closes Google Meet inactive tabs 3 minutes AFTER the meeting is over and only if the URL matches "meet.google.com/landing"
• Background Google Meetings are Unaffected: If you are running a google meeting in background and are on a different tab, multitasking as you usually do ;-), that tab will not be affected. 
• Open Source: MIT License. Used AI tools Claude Sonnet 3.5 and Cursor.AI to build this. 
https://github.com/gmayur/GoogleMeetTabManager
• Effortless organization: No more manual Google Meet tab management
• Boosts productivity: Reduces distractions and browser clutter
• Works silently: Set it and forget it - no interruptions to your work. The extension icon will show you how many tabs were closed in the last 16 hours.


#GoogleMeet #TabManagement #ProductivityTool #BrowserExtension #Kill #Close #Tab
